synopsis.text: Chuta, a young mouse in distress, seeks help when his family and fellow island mice fall victim to the ruthless weasel leader Noroi and his vicious gang. Desperate, he turns to a group of courageous ship mice, only to find they're unwilling to confront the formidable Noroi. Enter Gamba, an adventurous city mouse with a heart full of bravery. Moved by Chuta's plight, Gamba vows to save Chuta's island, Yumemigajima, and its inhabitants from the tyrannical grip of Noroi and his clan. Joined by a crew of valiant mice, Gamba embarks on a daring quest to defeat the evil weasels and restore peace to the island, in this thrilling adaptation of Atsuo Sait≈ç's original 1972 novel.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
